name: Monochrome by Arcane City Game Studios (Browser Edition)
name_original: Monochrome by Arcane City Game Studios (Browser Edition)
description:
A Lovecraftian Mystery!  Presented by Arcane City Game Studios. **note: if you can, the downloadable version is also available and will likely run smoother because Tyranobuilder is weird about audio sync in 'browser play' mode.**

In the noir-like future, a beautiful blonde strolls into your office one day.

As a private detective, formerly of the FBI and down on luck (and love), you know to trust your instincts, and the case that she wants you to take terrifies you - as it is similar in nature to a case that went terribly wrong when you were with the Bureau, in this story of love, redemption, mystery, and cosmic horror.

**Content Warning** Violence, Psychological Horror, Body Horror, Child Abduction, Sexual Overtones, Mature Themes, Language, Conspiracy, ARG.

Note: This game was made all by my lonesome, with a few specific game jams in mind but rushed a bit in the time allotted for the one with the shortest window, and it was created to fit the themes of all of them. I hope that it lives up to your expectations and you enjoy this visual novel! - Mr C, ACGS
